column5: This North Padre Island Beach Club Condo has beautiful flooring and comfortable furniture, located on the second floor and with no one overhead it is the place to relax. You will be only 1+ miles from the brand new Schlitterbahn Corpus Christi Water park. The beach, which is one block away, king-size bed, queen sofa-sleeper, fully equipped kitchen, linens, TV's, dedicated private WiFi. Gorgeous pool, hot tub, sauna, 24 hour fitness center, business center, horseshoe pit, BBQ pit and car rinse.
